arm_group.description: 10 children are evaluated at rest, during and after aspiration technique secretion
10 children will be assessed at rest, during and after the maneuver vibrocompression

brief_summary.textblock:
There may be pain and / or stress with vibrocompression. There may be pain and / or stress
      with the aspiration of secretions.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pain and Stress Assessment in Children

detailed_description.textblock:
Randomization to 10 children and 10 vibrocompression for aspiration of secretion.

      Fill in the evaluation form. Monitoring Heart Rate and Peripheral O2 Saturation (rest,
      during and after the technique performed).

      Photographic Record (rest, during and after the technique performed). Saliva Collection
      (rest, 5, 20 and 40 minutes after running technics). Data analysis.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Indication of Respiratory Therapy

        Fasting for one hour before the moment of collection

        Term of Free and Informed Consent Form (ICF) signed by parents or legal guardians

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Children in postoperative period acute

        Presence of thoracic drain or mediastinal

        Children using drugs to sedative or analgesic purpose of deep sedation

intervention.description: The 20 children, study participants will be randomly assigned to different groups, where 10 children will be evaluated during vibrocompression maneuver, and another 10 will be assessed on the aspiration procedure. Randomization will be performed using an opaque envelope for specifying which group selection technique is evaluated.

clinical_study.official_title: Pain and Stress Assessment in Children Undergoing Respiratory Physical Therapy Techniques

other_outcome.description: Also assess heart rate, respiratory rate, and oxygen saturation.
other_outcome.measure: Correlate the pain and the stress generated.

oversight_info.authority: Brazil: National Committee of Ethics in Research

primary_outcome.measure: Assess whether there is pain in children when performed randomized technique

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Assessment of pain and stress in children undergoing respiratory physiotherapy

secondary_outcome.description: Biochemical analysis of cortisol and salivary amylase
secondary_outcome.measure: Assess whether there is stress in children during the technical run

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Supportive Care
